longBusinessSummary: CEAT Limited manufactures and sells automotive tyres, tubes, and flaps in India and internationally. The company provides rubber tires and tubes for scooters, bikes, three wheelers, cars, buses, LCVs, trucks, and tractors. It exports its products. The company was formerly known as CEAT Tyres of India Limited and changed its name to CEAT Limited in 1990. CEAT Limited was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
